text: Phira sulemana unham di gala te hasa pi'a ate akhi'a, he mere raba! Mainu takata bakhasa ki maim teri kirapa la'i ahisana pragata kara sakam, jihari tusim mere ate mere mata pita te kiti hai. Ate maim cage karama karam jihare tuhanu pasada hona. Ate apani kirapa nala tusim' mainu apane neka badi'am vica samila kara di'u
